TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UserPersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo
Public NotInheritable Class UserPersonalizationStateInfo Inherits PersonalizationStateInfo

Docs.summary: Represents the per-user personalization information for a page and a user. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可以基于每个用户，用于确定单个用户的个性化设置有关的统计信息。

MemberSignature.Value: public UserPersonalizationStateInfo (string path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, string username, DateTime lastActivityDate);

Public Sub New (path As String, lastUpdatedDate As DateTime, size As Integer, username As String, lastActivityDate As DateTime)
public: UserPersonalizationStateInfo(System::String ^ path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, System::String ^ username, DateTime lastActivityDate);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo : string * DateTime * int * string * DateTime -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo

Docs.param: The page that the information applies to. path is an application-relative (using tilde syntax) virtual path.
The last date and time that the user information for a page was updated.
The size, in bytes, of the per-user state information for the page.
The user to whom the personalization information for the page applies.
The last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `lastActivityDate`参数指示用户已经 ASP.NET 应用程序中处于活动状态的最后一个时间。 可以通过其他 ASP.NET 功能，例如成员资格和配置文件中更新此日期。
`path` 和`username`如果非修剪`null`。

Docs.exception: , after trimming, is an empty string (""). \- or - , after trimming, is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastActivityDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastActivityDate { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the last time the user was active in the ASP.NET application associated with a page.
Docs.value: 用户处于与页面关联的 ASP.NET 应用程序中处于活动状态的最后一个时间。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可观测的值的用户是否是作为一个整体应用程序中仍处于活动状态。 可以通过其他 ASP.NET 功能，例如成员资格和配置文件中更新此日期。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Username As String
public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the user name to which the personalization information for a page applies.
Docs.value: 页的个性化信息应用到用户名称。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A>属性查找给定用户的统计个性化状态信息。
